item.title: 旧金山新市长谈无家可归问题、经济难以承受性和人工智能.
item.description:
每个城市都面临的重大挑战

【原文：

The big challenges that every city is facing

】

item.title: 奇货可居：旧金山市长谈无家可归者和人工智能（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居：旧金山市长谈无家可归者和人工智能（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: San Francisco’s Mayor on Homelessness and AI (Podcast)】

item.title: 网络公司称，黑客和犯罪团伙正联手盗窃货物
item.description: 根据最新的网络安全研究，黑客正在渗透到卡车运输和货运公司，计划窃取和出售货物运输，这一日益猖獗的活动最终可能使公司和消费者损失数十亿美元。【原文：Hackers are infiltrating trucking and freight companies in a scheme to steal and sell cargo shipments, a growing campaign that could end up costing companies and consumers billions of dollars, according to new cybersecurity research.】

item.title: 萨瓦德尔收购失败后，BBVA 首次进入 AT1 市场
item.description: BBVA SA 正在寻求筹集额外的一级资本，这是自上个月股东否决其对同业 Banco Sabadell SA 的收购以来的第一次。【原文：BBVA SA is looking to raise Additional Tier 1 capital for the first time since its lost pursuit for country peer Banco Sabadell SA was voted down by shareholders last month.】

item.title: Adnoc 首席执行官称人工智能将能源投资需求提高至 4 万亿美元
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国最大的原油生产商负责人苏尔坦-贾比尔（Sultan Al Jaber）表示，随着数据中心和人工智能的蓬勃发展，需求不断增加，全球能源行业每年需要 4 万亿美元的投资。【原文：The global energy industry needs annual investment of $4 trillion as the boom in data centers and artificial intelligence increases demand, according to Sultan Al Jaber, head of the biggest crude producer in the United Arab Emirates.】

item.title: 意大利因税务欺诈调查没收股份后，金巴利下跌
item.description: 意大利检察官周五下令扣押控制这家饮料生产商的控股公司约 13 亿欧元（15 亿美元）的股份后，Davide Campari-Milano NV 股价下跌。【原文：Davide Campari-Milano NV shares fell after Italian prosecutors on Friday ordered the seizure of around €1.3 billion ($1.5 billion) in shares from the holding company that controls the drinks maker.】

item.title: 习近平向韩国总统李明博赠送小米手机时调侃 "后门 "问题
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平在向韩国总统赠送小米智能手机时就安全后门问题开起了玩笑，这是在与唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）进行为期一周的紧张贸易谈判期间难得一见的自发轻松时刻。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping joked about security backdoors while presenting a pair of Xiaomi Corp. smartphones to his South Korean counterpart, a rare moment of spontaneous levity captured during a week of tense trade negotiations with Donald Trump.】

item.title: Alphabet 将出售至少 30 亿欧元债券为人工智能扩张提供资金
item.description: 谷歌母公司 Alphabet 公司今年第二次重返欧洲债务市场，进行多期债券销售，以筹集资金支持人工智能和云基础设施方面创纪录的资本支出。【原文：Alphabet Inc. is returning to Europe’s debt market for the second time this year with a multi-tranche sale, as the Google parent raises funds to support record capital spending on artificial intelligence and cloud infrastructure.】

item.title: 白宫称美国将于下周暂停对中国船只征收港口费
item.description: 美国预计将从下周起暂停向与中国有联系的船只征收为期一年的港口费，以缓和两国之间已成为贸易战症结的海上较量。【原文：The US is expected to suspend port fees for a year on China-linked vessels starting next week, as the two countries deescalate a maritime contest that had become a sticking point in the trade war.】

item.title: Lenskart IPO 价格引发对印度初创企业估值的担忧
item.description: 上周，Lenskart Solutions Ltd. 8.21 亿美元的首次公开募股在不到五个小时的时间内就被抢购一空。然而，这家眼镜零售商的定价引发了人们对印度初创企业上市后估值是否过高的担忧。【原文：Lenskart Solutions Ltd.’s $821 million initial public offering was sold out in less than five hours last week. Yet, the eyewear retailer’s pricing has sparked concern over whether Indian startups are being valued too richly as they go public.】

item.title: 印度央行重新捍卫卢比低点，10 月涨势荡然无存
item.description: 印度卢比再次逼近新低，央行最近的干预措施仅为今年表现最差的亚洲货币提供了有限的喘息机会。【原文：The Indian rupee is inching closer to a new low again, with the central bank’s recent interventions providing only a limited respite for Asia’s worst-performing currency this year.】

item.title: 阿布扎比阿德诺克公司（Adnoc）利用人工智能将意外停机减少一半
item.description: 阿布扎比国家石油公司（Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.【原文：Abu Dhabi National Oil Co. has started to deploy artificial intelligence to vastly reduce sudden maintenance halts and to make production forecasts more accurate.】

item.title: 瑞士通胀率意外降至 0.1%，对瑞士央行造成打击
item.description: 瑞士通胀率意外放缓至接近于零，这给瑞士央行增加了压力，迫使其回击货币强势，促进物价增长。【原文：Switzerland’s inflation unexpectedly slowed to near zero, adding pressure on the central bank to push back against the strength of its currency and boost price growth.】

item.title: 土耳其物价降幅超预期，对中央银行构成提振
item.description: 土耳其 10 月份的通胀放缓幅度超过预期，这对央行继续降息的决心起到了推动作用。【原文：Turkish inflation slowed more than expected in October, in boost to the central bank’s determination to continue cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将上涨，英镑保持稳定
泰国联盟因关税和货币波动下调销售展望
item.description: 包装食品公司 Thai Union Pcl 下调了销售增长预期，理由是包括美国关税和货币逆风在内的宏观经济因素令人头疼。【原文：Packaged food company Thai Union Pcl lowered its sales growth outlook, citing nagging macroeconomic factors including US tariffs and currency headwinds.】

item.title: 印度央行增持美元空头以抑制卢比跌势
item.description: 9 月份，印度央行在离岸衍生品市场上的美元空头头寸七个月来首次攀升，这反映出印度央行为阻止卢比贬值所做的努力。【原文：The Indian central bank’s short dollar book in the offshore derivatives market climbed in September for the first time in seven months, reflecting its efforts to stem the rupee losses.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长纳格尔称前景保持不变，但 12 月仍有选择余地
item.description: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，欧元区经济数据与欧洲央行的前景并无偏差，但决策者仍保持开放态度。【原文：Euro-zone economic data aren’t diverging from the European Central Bank’s outlook but policymakers are keeping their options open, according to Governing Council member Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: 中国珠宝商在黄金税改中首当其冲
item.description: 上周末宣布的税制改革取消了一些黄金零售商长期以来享受的优惠政策，中国的珠宝商和黄金行业的小型企业似乎将受到最严重的打击。【原文：Chinese jewelers and smaller firms in the gold sector look set to be hardest hit by tax changes announced over the weekend that got rid of long-standing incentives for some retailers of the metal.】

item.title: 莫迪减税在印度掀起价值 680 亿美元的节日购物热潮
item.description: 印度全面削减消费税，促使购物者在长达一个月的节日期间在从汽车到厨具的各种商品上大肆挥霍，推动了被美国征收 50%进口税的印度经济。【原文：India’s sweeping consumption tax cut drove shoppers to splurge on items from cars to kitchenware during the month-long festival season, boosting the economy that was slammed with a 50% import levy by the US.】

item.title: 中国在非洲的大型矿山有可能颠覆铁矿石市场
item.description:
几内亚西芒杜矿藏的规模和丰富程度可能会改变该行业的力量格局，并有助于国家经济的转型。【原文：

The size and richness of the Simandou deposit in Guinea could shift the industry’s power dynamics and help transform the nation’s economy.

】

item.title: 什么关税？欧洲公司许多企业在美国获利，欧洲公司做出调整
item.description: 欧洲公司的业绩显示，它们在应对美国关税方面比预期的要好得多；这是明年的一个好兆头，预计明年它们将实现两位数的利润增长。【原文：European companies’ results show they’re navigating US tariffs a lot better than anticipated — a good omen for next year when they’re expected to deliver double-digit profit growth.】

item.title: 预计货币政策委员会将按兵不动，贝利是英国央行决策的关键
item.description: 英国央行预计将跳过三个月的降息周期，这是该央行自去年 8 月开始放松利率以来首次跳过降息周期，这一决定将由行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）作出。【原文：The Bank of England is expected to skip its three-month cutting cycle for the first time since it started easing rates in August last year, in a close decision that will rest with Governor Andrew Bailey.】

item.title: 马来西亚发生刺伤儿童案件后，Roblox 面临审查
item.description: 据一位部长称，Roblox 公司承诺加强安全措施，并准备与马来西亚政府共享数据，因为在这款流行的视频游戏与东南亚国家的一起刺杀案件有关之后，马来西亚官员正在考虑对其采取行动。【原文：Roblox Corp. pledged to boost safety measures and is prepared to share data with the Malaysian government, according to a minister, as officials weigh action over the popular video game after it was linked to a stabbing case in the Southeast Asian nation.】

item.title: 美国称中国停止报复性关税，大豆延续涨势
item.description: 在美国称中国在上周的一次重要峰会后同意停止报复性关税，并重申亚洲国家今年将增加采购后，大豆延续涨势。【原文：Soybeans extended gains after the US said China agreed to halt retaliatory tariffs following a key summit last week, and reiterated the Asian nation will ramp up purchases this year.】

item.title: 铁矿石因中国 PMI 令人失望和基本面疲软而下跌
item.description: 由于对中国经济前景的担忧，铁矿石下跌，原因是衡量中国制造业活动扩张的指标低于预期。【原文：Iron ore dropped on concerns about China’s economic outlook, as a gauge of the country’s manufacturing activity expanded less than expected.】

item.title: 对中国经济的担忧导致铜价连续第三天下跌
item.description: 铜从历史高位进一步下滑，本周金属市场开局好坏参半，原因是人们对世界第二大经济体的健康状况感到担忧。【原文：Copper slipped further from an all-time high, with metals posting a mixed start to the week amid concerns about the health of the world’s second-biggest economy.】

item.title: 香港将允许加密货币交易所利用全球资金池
item.description: 香港最高市场监管机构表示，香港计划放宽规则，鼓励加密货币交易活动。【原文：Hong Kong plans to ease rules to encourage crypto trading activity in the city, its top market regulator said.】

item.title: 人工智能发出令人难以置信的市场反弹信号
item.description:
从美联储鹰派到中美停战的一周大事，在人工智能支出前景面前相形见绌。【原文：

A big week, from Fed hawks to the US-China truce, was dwarfed by AI spending prospects.

】

item.title: 韩国 Kospi 指数延续涨势，人工智能势头因与英伟达的关系而上升
item.description: 韩国股票基准在二十多年来最强劲的月度涨势基础上再接再厉，凸显了韩国市场在全球人工智能竞赛中不断提升的作用，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：South Korea’s equity benchmark is building on its strongest monthly rally in over two decades, underscoring the market’s rising role in the global AI race as highlighted by Nvidia Corp.’s local deals.】
